attributes.action: Change the name our our nation from Great Britain to Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain was once upon a time a great nation.  But alas those days are long gone.  We are now an overpopulated, expensive, congested, miserable and fed up nation.  As such, I call for the name Great be dropped and that our nation is now either called "Britain" or just by the country names. England Wales and Scotland

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
